page.title: 06Memories of Kettering
page.content: I interviewed Mrs Denney and these are some of her replies.She remembered England winning the World Cup in 1966.Mini skirts were the fashion in the 1960's.Early in the 1960's men wore Teddy Boy suits.Her favourite holiday resort is Madeira.Her best singing star was Cliff Richard.She used to watch "What's My Line",but she doesn't watch it anymore.In the 1960's she became a member of the Council and in 1968 she became the Mayoress of Kettering. Twenty years ago houses were being built in Lynwood Close and along Pennine. She had a car in the 1960's and used it a lot but she also used the buses.
